item.title: Zhipeng Huang was awarded a prestigious Joachim Herz Stiftung PIER fellowship
item.description:
Zhipeng Huang was awarded a prestigeous Joachim Herz Stiftung PIER fellowship on 29. October 2013. This fellowship was awarded before he started his PhD at DESY. It supported him to develop the large molecule source for free-electron laser experiments, which is the core part of his PhD dissertation.

You can find more information in the DESY newsletter.

Download the newsletter.

item.title: Zhipeng Huang started his project at Colorado State University
item.description:
Zhipeng Huang started his project at Colorado State University focusing on upgrading the light beam induced current setup. He also worked on the temperature-dependent/illumination-dependent IV, CV, QE experiments on thin film solar cells (e.g. CdTe, CIGS, etc.) to reveal the device efficiency loss mechanism.

Download the newsletter.
